name: Shersteria
startIntroPart1: The Great Shersterian Empire lives once more, and the world is doomed to fall in your hands.
startIntroPart2: You, as the queen of this grand empire, can decide how this world becomes Shersterian territory. Begin the great conquest.
declaringWar: The queen finds your state abhorrent and in her way. Prepare to fight.
attacked: You are a fool! Your death will be swift and painful!
defeated: You have taken the Shersterian empire down, but our queen's soul will haunt your every waking moment.
introduction: We welcome you to the Great Shersteria. We hope to see us working as a team.
hateLetsHearIt: What could you possibly offer us?
You would be wise to make this a good deal.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
hateYes: Perhaps we will reconsider our stance on you.
afterPeace: You may live for just a bit longer, our queen has other priorities.
tradeRequest: We believe that we can make a deal.

name: Saeni
startIntroPart1: This federal state stands alone, though with many faces within and many names held.
startIntroPart2: The Saenian confederacy will dominate this world.
declaringWar: You are a scourge! Prepare to bleed for our state.
attacked: Our military might will prove superior.
defeated: We may die now, but we will rise again...
introduction: Greetings! We walk a path uncharted! May we speak in good tidings!
hateLetsHearIt: What is so important as to bother us?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Peace in our time is assured, for now.
tradeRequest: This deal shall peak your interest.

name: Ininiza
declaringWar: We are WAR! We are NATION! You are DOOMED.
attacked: WE WERE GONNA DO THAT! GRRRR!
defeated: HOW!? WE ARE GODS! We will CURSE you from beyond!
